csr.uart.rx

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x4
Source:
csr.rdl

Description

UART Rx Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31] valid r 0x0 csr.uart.rx.valid
[30] oflow r 0x0 csr.uart.rx.oflow
[29:8] - - - -
[7:0] data r 0x0 csr.uart.rx.data[7:0]

Field Descriptions

valid - csr.uart.rx.valid

Indicates valid data transfer from the UART to the CPU

oflow - csr.uart.rx.oflow

Indicates that some data bytes are lost

data - csr.uart.rx.data[7:0]

Received data
